title: asd
fhyht
content:
# Great! Let's plan the full system.

## Quick answer on YouTube:

**Private** = Only you can see. Won't work for sharing.

**Unlisted** = Anyone with link can watch. Perfect for your use case.

Use **Unlisted** videos.

---

## Full System Architecture

Since you want to create/manage posts yourself, we have two options:

### Option A: Simple (JSON file + GitHub)
```
You edit JSON file → Push to GitHub → Site updates
```

### Option B: Admin Panel (Local or hosted)
```
You login → Create/edit posts in UI → Saves to JSON/Database
```

---

## I recommend: Option B with Local Admin

Here's the structure:

```
your-site/
├── index.html          ← Public site (what visitors see)
├── admin.html          ← Your private admin panel
├── data/
│   ├── articles.json   ← Your articles
│   ├── links.json      ← Your bookmarks
│   └── videos.json     ← Your videos
├── css/
│   └── style.css
└── js/
    ├── app.js          ← Public site logic
    └── admin.js        ← Admin panel logic
```

---

## How it works:

### 1. Admin Panel (admin.html)
- Password protected (simple)
- Create/Edit/Delete posts
- Upload images (or paste URLs)
- Paste YouTube links (auto-extracts thumbnail)
- Saves to JSON files

### 2. Public Site (index.html)
- Reads from JSON files
- Displays your content
- Filters, search, etc.

### 3. Hosting
- **GitHub Pages** or **Netlify** or **Vercel**
- Free
- Auto-deploys when you push

---

## Content Types:

### Article
```json
{
  "id": "1",
  "type": "article",
  "title": "On taking your time",
  "description": "Why rushing leaves you empty...",
  "image": "https://...",
  "content": "Full article text here...",
  "date": "2024-12-15"
}
```

### Link
```json
{
  "id": "2",
  "type": "link",
  "title": "The wet codebase",
  "description": "Dan Abramov on duplication",
  "url": "https://overreacted.io/...",
  "thumbnail": "https://...",
  "date": "2024-12-12"
}
```

### Video
```json
{
  "id": "3",
  "type": "video",
  "title": "How film editors work",
  "description": "Breakdown of editing craft",
  "youtubeId": "dQw4w9WgXcQ",
  "duration": "12:34",
  "date": "2024-12-10"
}
```

---

## Want me to build this?

I'll create:

1. **admin.html** — Your content management panel
2. **Updated index.html** — Reads from JSON
3. **Sample JSON files** — Starting data

**Say "build it" and I'll start with the admin panel.**
